title.en: The Banished Court Magician Aims to Become the Strongest

altTitles.ja: 味方が弱すぎて補助魔法に徹していた宮廷魔法師、追放されて最強を目指す

altTitles.ja-ro: Mikata ga Yowa Sugite Hojo Mahou ni Toushite Ita Kyuutei Mahoushi, Tsuihou Sarete Saikyou wo Mezasu

altTitles.ko: 아군이 너무 약해 보조 마법으로 일관하던 궁정 마법사, 추방당해서 최강을 노린다

altTitles.zh-hk: 我方太弱而徹底變成輔助魔法的宮廷魔法師，被退隊後以最強為目標

description.en: "This party doesn't need an incompetent magician who can only use supportive magic. You're fired, Alec Yugret." Suddenly, Alec, a court magician who had joined the crown prince's party to help him conquer dungeons, was banished from the party. And not just the party, but the crown prince's harassment has banished him from the royal palace as well, and a friend from the "magic academy" approached Alec, who was at his wit's end. "Hey, Alec. Do you want to try to conquer the dungeon with us again?" And so, together with the friends he used to party with, Alec begins his second journey in life.
description.ja:
王太子を陰ながら支えてきたのに、能無し呼ばわりされ追放宣告された宮廷魔法師アレク。魔法学院時代の仲間・天才補助魔法師のヨルハに誘われたことで、かつてダンジョン踏破記録を打ち立てた伝説のパーティーが再集結することに！

補助魔法しか使えない能無しは必要ない。オマエはクビだ」　王太子を陰ながら支える宮廷魔法師・アレクに突き付けられた追放宣告。職を失った彼の前に現れたのは、かつての仲間で天才補助魔法師の少女・ヨルハ。「キミの力が必要なんだ。また始めよう…あの日の続きを」　かくして魔法学院時代、ダンジョン踏破記録を打ち立てた伝説のパーティーが再集結――！

title.en: A Parallel World With a 1:39 Male to Female Ratio Is Unexpectedly Normal

altTitles.ja: 男女比1:39の平行世界は思いのほか普通

altTitles.ja-ro: Danjohi 1:39 no Heikou Sekai wa Omoi no Hoka Futsuu

altTitles.es-la: Un Mundo Donde 1 Hombre cada 39 Mujeres es lo Normal
El mundo paralelo con una relación de hombres y mujeres de 1:39 resulta ser inesperadamente normal

description.en:
Satou Sou is accidentally swapped with himself in a parallel world with a male/female ratio of 1:39. He finds a kind family and lovely women at the place where he was switched. Seeing the outside of these women, he's relieved to see that the number of men and women has changed, but not much else. However, their inner lives are filled with conflicts and troubles.

---

Alternative version: [A Parallel World With a 1:39 Male to Female Ratio Is Unexpectedly Normal 【R18】](https://mangadex.org/title/dcf01405-2bb3-40a4-bd8b-af1eb90c8e8e)
description.ja: 主人公「佐藤 蒼」はひょんなことから男女比1：39の平行世界の自分と入れ替わってしまう。入れ変わった先には、優しい家族や可愛い女性ばかりそんな彼女たちの外面を見て主人公は「男女の数が変化しただけで他はそんなに変わらないな」と安心する。だが、彼女たちの内面では葛藤や煩悩に溢れかえっていた。
description.es-la: Sou Satou, un chico de secundaria que fue transportado a un mundo paralelo. Este mundo resulta ser que la relación de hombres y mujeres es de 1:39, esto quiere decir que por cada 1 hombre en el mundo hay 39 mujeres, sin embargo, parece ser que este nuevo mundo resulta ser inesperadamente ¿normal?...

description.en: Caught in a tragic cycle of betrayal and revenge, Ezen helps Cliff, a slave and enemy of her family, escape—only for him to return years later with overwhelming power, seeking vengeance. Forced into marriage, their pain intertwines, ending in her death during childbirth. Yet, her soul awakens in the past, uncovering hidden truths that could change their doomed fate.

altTitles.ja: スレイブB

altTitles.th: slave B นักรบทาส

description.en:
This is a world whose peace was destroyed by the Shadow Lord, ‘Secneum’. ‘Niro’ is a half-elf, half-human boy who lost his parents as a baby and was adopted by a slave couple. In this world, slaves are not treated as humans. Since Niro’s adoptive parents are slaves, they are mistreated and eventually lose their lives. Now Niro is alone once more, and must shoulder the burdens of his family and do whatever is takes to protect his two younger siblings. If Niro wants to escape this fate, there is only one thing he can do. He must graduate from the academy, ‘Excanum’ just like the current Emperor, ‘Muren’ who was once a slave!

description.fr:
Il n'est rien, il veut tout. Enfant esclave, il vivait heureux avant que ses deux parents ne se fassent assassiner par un maître jaloux ! Responsable de ses deux jeunes soeurs à seulement 13 ans, il essaie d’intégrer une prestigieuse école de magie qui les sauverait de leur condition. Cherchant à impressionner le roi pour y accéder, il échoue totalement et se retrouve finalement dans une mine infestée de monstres. Mais son courage et sa détermination le font remarquer. Et il intègre la prestigieuse école : Excanum !

description.ko:
악신 '세크네움'에 의해 평화가 깨져버린 세계. 인간과 엘프 사이에서 태어난 '하프 엘프' 종족인 '니로'는, 갓난 아기일 때 부모를 잃고 인간 노예 부부에 의해 거두어진다. 노예는 사람 취급을 받지 못하는 세상에서 자라며 니로는 아버지와 어머니 모두 억울하게 잃고 어린 두 동생을 책임지는 가장의 역할까지 떠안게 된다. 지옥같은 노예 신분에서 벗어나 어린 두 동생을 지킬 수 있는 방법은 오직 하나. 노예 출신의 현 황제 '뮤렌'이 졸업한 학교, '엑스카눔'을 졸업하는 것 뿐! 하지만 노예의 신분인 니로가 '엑스카눔'에 입학하는 길은 보이질 않는데... 니로는 과연 절망에서 벗어나 '엑스카눔'에 들어갈 수 있을까.

Ниро родился в мире, гармония которого была нарушена Повелителем Теней "Секнеоном". В младенчестве полуэльфа приютила пара рабов, но через несколько лет они умерли, и мальчик остался сиротой. Теперь Ниро предстоит защитить свою маленькую семью.
Чтобы снять клеймо раба, юноша должен окончить академию "Эксканум", подобно нынешнему императору, который в прошлом тоже был рабом.

description.zh:
尼洛从小被收养，当养父母意外身亡，幼小的尼洛被迫承担起抚养双胞胎妹妹的重任。为了改变奴隶身份，尼洛用魔法算计了梅兰国王，却被判流放矿山，与妹妹们分离。在矿山苦练剑法，立了大功，获得了去贵族学校上学的机会的尼洛…在学校会遇到什么困难？他何时才能与妹妹们团聚？最终他又能否改变奴隶身份

description.zh-hk:
世界的和平遭到邪神「塞科內恩」破壞。

人類和妖精生下的「半妖精」——「尼洛」
在襁褓時期便失去雙親，
由一對人類奴隸夫妻收養。

尼洛生長在一個奴隸不被當人看的世界，
在痛失雙親以後，
肩負起照顧兩名年幼妹妹的重責大任。

只有一個方法能讓他擺脫奴隸身分、保護兩個妹妹，
那就是從奴隸出身的現任皇帝
「梅蘭」的母校「艾斯卡儂」畢業!

只不過，身為奴隸的尼洛似乎找不到
進入「艾斯卡儂」就讀的辦法...

他究竟能不能擺脫絕望，成功進到「艾斯卡儂」呢?

altTitles.ja: Minamike
みなみけ
南家

description.en:
*Minami-ke* ("The Minami Household") is a manga following the three Minami sisters, Haruka, Kana, and Chiaki in their lives at home and school. It's a funny manga that depicts how these characters interact with each other and their classmates. Although they are ordinary girls, their ordinary adventures are told in an extraordinary manner.
**Source:** MangaUpdates

500 years before the story of Saiyuki, a heretic child with golden eyes is brought into Heaven. He is given into the reluctant care of a minor deity named Konzen, the nephew of the Merciful Goddess Kanzeon Bosatsu. Konzen eventually gives the child the name "Goku". Goku becomes friends with two other minor gods, Marshal Tenpou and General Kenren of the Western Army of Heaven. He also meets a strange little boy who seems to be his own age, the War Prince Nataku. Although Goku is happy in his new home, Heaven is not kind to heretics. There are those who would use Nataku and Goku as tools in an attempt to seize the throne of Heaven, and Konzen, Tenpou, and Kenren may not be able to save them.

title.en: Do All Mothers in Childcare Novels have to Die?

description.en: Reborn as a mother doomed to die in a childcare novel, she fights to change her fate. When trying to escape her tragic destiny, she gets caught by the emperor himself—her future husband! Instead of death, she finds herself at the center of a loving family, but can she defy the trope and survive?

altTitles.ja: 悪党たちに育てられてます！

altTitles.pt-br: Eu Estou Sendo Criada por Vilões

description.en:
I thought I was an illegitimate child… but it turns out that I was a complete stranger?!

A year after transmigrating as an extra, I found out that I was on the verge of being kicked out.

I said I’d rather leave the house on my own.

“Actually, this child is my daughter. Right, daughter?”

Did I catch the attention of the psychopathic duke?

‘I heard that the money he gave after playing with someone was enough to buy an island?’

I got along with him as his daughter because I thought I could get his fortune later on. And a few months later, I would leave his house with a thick bank account.

“Stay by my side until I tell you to leave.”

However, my dad, who regarded me as a toy, came looking for me and held me back.

=

After returning home due to dad’s persuasion, the families and my dad fought to adopt me. My uncles and aunts gathered to protect me, and future psychos began to have strange obsessions over me.

“Happy Birthday, Ayrin. You’re the head as of today.”

On top of that, the duke’s position was my birthday present.
Everything is going just as I expected.

[Hey, how long are you going to sleep? Grandma said she is gonna take you off life support!]
[Cha Miso, you’re going to die!]

What is that voice?
Will I be okay like this? (Synopsis: Gourmet Scans)
description.tr: Gayrimeşru bir çocuk olduğumu sanıyordum… ama tamamen yabancı olduğum ortaya çıktı?! Yan karakter olarak beden değiştirdikten bir yıl sonra kovulmanın eşiğinde olduğumu öğrendim. Evden tek başıma çıkmayı tercih ederim dedim. “Aslında bu çocuk benim kızım. Değil mi kızım?” Psikopat dükün dikkatini mi çektim ? "Biriyle oynadıktan sonra verdiği paranın bir ada almaya yettiğini duydum?" Onunla kızı olarak iyi anlaştım çünkü daha sonra servetini ele geçirebileceğimi düşündüm ve birkaç ay sonra onun evinden kalın bir banka hesabıyla ayrılmayı planladım. "Sana gitmeni söyleyene kadar yanımda kal." Ancak beni oyuncak gibi gören babam beni aramaya geldi ve beni tuttu. *** Babamın iknasıyla eve döndükten sonra aileler ve babam beni evlat edinmek için mücadele etti. Amcalarım ve teyzelerim beni korumak için toplandılar ve geleceğin psikopatları bana karşı garip saplantılar beslemeye başladılar. "Doğum günün kutlu olsun Ayrin. Bugün itibariyle başkan sensin.” Üstelik Dük'ün konumu benim doğum günü hediyemdi. Her şey beklediğim gibi gidiyor. [Hey, daha ne kadar uyuyacaksın? Büyükanne sana tutucunu çıkarmanı söyledi!] [Cha Miso, öleceksin!] Bu ses nedir? Böyle iyi olacak mıyım?
description.pt-br: Negligenciada por sua família, Cha Miso sonha em viver em seu romance favorito como a amada personagem principal. Então, um dia, ela acorda dentro do romance, mas como Eiryn Etam, uma personagem secundária oprimida que será expulsa de sua casa! Para evitar mais negligência, ela planeja ir embora antes que isso aconteça. Mas quando Erno Etam, o herdeiro maluco da Casa Etam, afirma que Eiryn é sua filha, seus planos são frustrados e Eiryn se vê no meio de um conflito entre a Casa Etam e um elenco de vilões.

altTitles.en: Kill the Male Lead to Become the Demoness

altTitles.vi: Giết Chết Nam Chính, Ta Trở Thành Nữ Ma Đầu.

description.en:
After killing the male lead, the originally innocent girl transformed into a villainess.
Just as she was about to enjoy her newfound freedom, she died a violent death and returned back to the start of the game.
Having carried over with her all the skills she acquired in her previous "playthrough", she was prepared to kill the male lead again; however, the current circumstances seem a bit... strange?
description.ru:
Убив главного героя, девушка становится монстром в глазах других, но, собираясь насладиться свободой, трагично погибает и оказывается в начале игры. Сохранив знания и навыки из прошлой жизни, она собирается повторить своё убийство, однако происходящее кажется немного… странным.
«Да кто же ты такой?!»
description.zh: 杀死男主角后，原小白花女二黑化成了女魔头，正当她快意江湖的时候却暴毙回到游戏的开头。继承了上周目所有能力的她准备先下手为强再次杀死男主，只是现在的情况好像有点……意外？ “不对，你到底谁啊——？！”

description.en:
The year is 1420. A small village in the Kingdom of Bohemia is wiped out by marauding Crusader knights. A young peasant girl named Šárka is the sole survivor of the massacre. She meets up with Jan Žižka, leader of the Hussite army, and chooses to take up arms…
___
**Official English:** [emaqi - United States & Canada only!](https://emaqi.com/manga/divci-valka-maidens-war)
description.pt-br: O ano é 1420. Uma pequena vila no Reino da Boêmia é destruída por cavaleiros da cruzada. Uma jovem camponesa chamada Sarka é a única sobrevivente do massacre. Ela se encontra com Jan Zizka, líder do exército hussita, e decide pegar em armas…

description.en: The highly-acclaimed fifth arc of Hirohiko Araki’s JoJo’s Bizarre Adventure shifts the action from Japan to Italy, as Koichi Hirose heads to Europe to find an aspiring gangster named Giorno Giovanna, the secret son of Dio Brando, scourge of the Joestar family. Organized crime meets family drama and unbelievable enemy Stands in JoJo’s Bizarre Adventure: Part 5—Golden Wind!
description.it:
Napoli, 2001. Giorno Giovana è un piccolo criminale con il grande sogno di diventare una "Gang-Star". Giorno ha una connessione con la linea sanguigna Joestar, e possiede lo stand "Gold Experience". Il suo sogno inizia a diventare realtà quando incontra Bruno Bucciarati, un partecipante della gang "Passione" e un portatore di stand. Giunti alla conclusione che tutti e due hanno idee simili, e che unanimamente non concordano sugli affari della gang, Giorno rivela il suo obiettivo: con l'aiuto di Bruno, riformerà Passione spodestando il capo della gang.

Giorno, una volta diventato membro di Passione ed entrato nella squadra di Bucciarati, scopre che non è una semplice gang, è piena di portatori di stand. Una volta confrontatesi con le altre squadre, sleali e imprevedibili, scoprono che il loro obiettivo di cambiare la gang dall'interno non sarà facile da raggiungere. Parlando a proposito di questi avversari, Gioeno tenta di ralire tra i ranghi per avvicinarsi al boss, un uomo circondato dal mistero.

altTitles.ja: マリッジグレー

altTitles.zh: 想不通可爱老婆为什么要与我结婚

altTitles.zh-ro: Xiǎng bùtōng kě'ài lǎopó wèishéme yào yǔ wǒ jiéhūn

description.en: My wife is suspicious!! Why did she marry a guy like me…? Ordinary average guy Tsuchioka Naotsugu ended up with Yoshino, who's perfect in all angles of beauty, know-how, and sociability. It's not "marriage blue" it's everyday life questioning over things, so it's "marriage gray" newlywed life, go!
description.ja: ウチのかわいすぎる妻は、なぜ超平凡な自分と結婚したのか――!? 自己評価激低な夫・槌岡直継は、妻・憙乃への疑念から“マリッジグレー”に陥っていた！一方の憙乃は、日々溢れまくる直継へのLOVEを抑えるのに一生懸命で…!?
description.pt-br: Minha esposa é muito suspeita! Eu não entendo por que ela se casou com alguém como eu? Por que uma mulher bonita, inteligente, e considerada como a Yoshino se casaria com alguém comum como Naotsugu!! Não há casamento azul aqui, apenas um suspeito caso de casamento cinza!!

description.de:
Im Alter von acht Jahren verlor Ijin Yoo seine Eltern bei einem Flugzeugabsturz und strandete in einem fremden Land, wo er gezwungen war, ein Kindersöldner zu werden, um zu überleben. Zehn Jahre später kehrt er nach Hause zurück, um mit seiner Familie in Korea wieder vereint zu sein. Dort scheint alles friedlich zu sein, doch schon bald muss Ijin feststellen, dass das Leben als Teenager eine ganz andere Art des Überlebens ist. Da ihm nur noch ein Jahr in der Oberschule bleibt, muss Ijin neue Taktiken erlernen, um sich auf dem Schlachtfeld der Schule zurechtzufinden. Kann er ein Jahr Oberschule überleben? Oder wird die Schule vielmehr in der Lage sein, IHN zu überleben?

---
Die Geschichte handelt von einem jungen Koreaner, der bei einem Flugzeugabsturz seine Eltern verloren hat. Das Kind landet irgendwie in einem vom Krieg zerrissenen Teil der Welt und wird zu einem Top-Söldner im Teenageralter. Irgendwie findet er seine Familie wieder und beschließen, ein ruhiges Leben mit seiner Familie zu führen.

description.en:
At the age of eight, Ijin Yu lost his parents in a plane crash and became stranded in a foreign land, forced to become a child mercenary in order to stay alive. 

He returns home ten years later to be reunited with his family in Korea, where food and shelter are plenty and everything seems peaceful. But Ijin will soon learn that life as a teenager is a whole other feat of survival. With only one year of high school left, Ijin must master new tactics to maneuver his way around the schoolhouse battleground.

Can he survive a year of high school? Or rather, will the school be able to survive him?
description.es:
A los ocho años, Ijin Yu perdió a sus padres en un accidente aéreo y quedó varado en un país extranjero, forzado a convertirse en mercenario para sobrevivir. Diez años después, regresa a su hogar para reunirse con su familia en Corea, en donde sobra la comida y todo parece estar en paz. Sin embargo, Ijin pronto descubrirá que la vida de adolescente es otro tipo de supervivencia. En su último año de secundaria, Ijin debe dominar nuevas tácticas para resistir en el campo de batalla escolar. ¿Podrá sobrevivir a su último año? ¿O podrá su escuela sobrevivir a él?

altTitles.ja: 転生王女は愛より領地が欲しいので政略結婚を希望します！

altTitles.zh: 转生公主比起爱更想要领地所以期望政治联姻！

altTitles.zh-hk: 轉生公主比起愛更想要領地所以期望政治聯姻！

altTitles.en: The Reincarnated Princess Wants Territories Over Love so She Wants a Political Marriage

description.en:
Princess Fairis, reincarnated into the world of strategy simulation games, uses her knowledge of the games she played in her previous life and is called the Warrior Princess. However, as soon as the war ends, she is ordered by the king to marry. In addition, she competes with her sister in arranged marriages and, depending on her partner, cannot get involved in national politics. ...I want to build my country, not get married! As she struggles to arrange a political marriage that will give her more territory, Orpheed, a wizard who is also her trusted subordinate and a potential bride, unexpectedly confesses his love for her...?

A love comedy between a reincarnated princess with zero love skills and the strongest wizard with an intense love.

description.en: After growing up an orphan, Mitsuha has a healthy respect for money and a desire to live well—at least, until she dies after being pushed off a cliff. Waking up in a strange fantasy world, Mitsuha narrowly survives an encounter with a pack of wolves, then realizes she has the power to move between this world and the real one. A lesser person might embark on heroic adventures—Mitsuha instead immediately recognizes the lucrative possibilities of her new situation, and heads out to buy an arsenal of modern weapons. Her goal: to acquire 80,000 gold, and the life of leisure she's always dreamed of!
description.ja: 山野ミツハは18歳でありながら中学生に見られてしまう童顔小柄な少女。高校卒業を目前にして両親と頼れる兄を一度に失い、いきなり天涯孤独の身になってしまう。ショックで大学受験にも失敗して途方に暮れていたミツハは、たまたま謎の存在から「世界間転移」という能力を与えられる。そこから彼女が思いついた将来設計は、世間一般の常識の斜め上をいっていた──!!
description.pt-br: Uma garota de 18 anos que perdeu sua família em um acidente, Yamano Mitsuha cai de um penhasco em um dia qualquer e é transportada para um mundo diferente com uma civilização ao nível da Europa Medieval. Mitsuha descobre que é possível ir e retornar à terra após uma luta mortal com lobos. Assim, ela decide viver em ambos os mundos. “Para ter segurança na velhice, eu vou mirar em alcançar 80.000 moedas de ouro!” “Tentarei não deixar coisas estranhas circularem para não distorcer o progresso do mundo, mas não vou me conter pelo bem da minha vida fácil e segura!” Enquanto usa três pistolas junto com palavras e ações que parecem decentes, em sua cabeça Yamano Mitsuha é uma garota esperta. Fazendo um esforço para ganhar dinheiro mesmo com um pequeno corpo que parece uma criança para os ocidentais!

altTitles.ja: 火ノ丸相撲

description.en:
It is a divine ritual, a martial art, a combat sport—it's sumo!!  
A "small" new student, Ushio Hinomaru, appears before the weak little sumo club of Oodachi High School! The words "big" and "heavy" are the rules to this sport, which does not fit this newbie any inch, but this guy goes and does what…!? Ushio and the small sumo club climbs its way to the top!  
The goal is Hinoshita Kaisan (a title for the highest rank in professional sumo, equivalent of Yokozuna)!  
A fired up high school sumo tale—no retakes allowed!!
description.es-la: Es un ritual divino, un arte marcial, un deporte de combate— ¡¡Es el sumo!! ¡Un “bajito” nuevo estudiante, Ushio Hinomaru, aparece ante el pequeño y débil Club de Sumo de la Secundaria Oodachi! Las palabras “grande” y “pesado” son las reglas para este deporte, las cuales no se encuentran en este pequeño novato para empezar, ¡¿pero este chico sigue adelante y hace qué…?! ¡Ushio y el pequeño Club de Sumo trazan su camino para llegar a la cima! ¡El objetivo es el Hinoshita Kaizan! (Un título para el rango más alto en el sumo profesional, equivalente al Yokozuna). ¡¡Una fervorosa historia de sumo sin retorno empieza!!
description.pt-br: Um ritual divino, uma arte marcial, um esporte isso que é o combate do sumô !! O "pequeno" novo aluno, Ushio Hinomaru, aparece perante ao fraco e pequeno clube de sumô do Colégio Oodachi! As palavras "grandes" e "pesados" são as regras para esse esporte, que não se encaixam em nenhuma polegada desse novato, mas o que esse garoto quer no clube...!? Ushio e o pequeno clube de sumô começam a trilhar seu caminho para o topo! O objetivo é Hinoshita Kaisan! O título de maior lutador de Sumô!

description.en:
Despite having only one arm, Daven had finally proven his worth after defeating his cousin Kazin in honorable combat. But Kazin took advantage of Daven’s mercy, stabbing him in the back and imprisoning him for life.

500 years later, the minor god Yulian is reborn and unknowingly summons Daven’s soul into the body of a young boy named Vincent Adenka.

As the pair work to reveal the truth of Daven and Kazin, Vincent must relearn the art of combat while Yulian discovers the art of reincarnation.
description.ko:
최강의 무가 사미온에서 외팔이 방계로 태어난 데이븐.
반쪽짜리 무인이라며 갖은 조롱과 멸시를 딛고 사미온의 직계 천재마저 넘어섰으나,
결국 가문과 부모에게 버림받아 가장 초라한 최후를 맞이하게 되는 줄 알았는데...
500년 뒤 새로운 몸에서 눈을 떴다!

‘내게도 오른팔이 있다?’

새로운 가문의 적통.
천부적인 재능의 육체.
전생의 경험.
그리고 그와 함께하는 신까지.

환생을 했더니, 모든 것이 달라져 있었다.

description.pt-br: Makoto Kowata é uma bruxa aprendiz de Yokohama que, ao completar 15 anos, se muda para Aomori, no interior do Japão, para morar com seus tios e desenvolver seus poderes. Acompanhada de sua gata Chito, Makoto terá que se adaptar à nova vida, à escola, aos amigos e descobrir que a magia está presente em pequenas coisas.

description.ar:
عرضت أريا عقد زواج. إلى الدوق الاكبر فالنتين الذي قيل أنه باع روحه للشيطان. حتى تتمكن من حماية نفسها ولويد [تزوجني] أعطته أريا مذكرة تطلب يده للزواج بورقة القيقب الصغيرة مثل يديها. [إنه عقد زواج ، لذا سنتطلق بعد 10 سنوات ...] أمسك السيد الشاب بالملاحظة التي كانت آريا تكتبها ومزقها إلى أشلاء. "إذن أين يمكنني ختمها؟" "أخبرتني أنك ستطلقني بمجرد أن نتقدم في السن." كبر الشيطان الصغير وقبل جبهتها. "منذ أن أصبحنا بالغين ، علينا بدلاً من ذلك إبرام عقد للبالغين".

description.cs:
"Ak existuje ďalší život, zachránim ťa." Aria je posledná siréna, netvor, ktorý očaruje ľudí piesňou. Spútaná je nútená spievať šľachticom, až kým nezomrie. Kým ju démonizovaný veľkovojvoda Lloyd Valentine oslobodí, je už neskoro. Už vydýchla naposledy... alebo si to aspoň myslí. Keď sa Aria prebudí v minulosti, zasvätí svoj život ochrane vojvodu, ale rozmýšľa, či je to naozaj všetko, za čo jej krátky život stojí. Bude niekedy slobodná? Alebo je táto siréna predurčená spievať navždy tú istú pieseň?

---

description.en:
Aria offered a contract marriage. To Grand Duke Valentine who was said to have sold his soul to the devil. So she could protect herself and him.

"Marry me."

Aria passed him a note which asked for his hand in marriage with her little maple leaf like hands.

"It's a contract marriage so we'll divorce 10 years later..."

The young master grabbed the note Aria was writing and ripped it to shreds.

"So where do I stamp it?"

"You told me you'll divorce me once we're older."

The young devil grew up and kissed her forehead.

"Since we have become adults, we have to instead make a contract for adults."

---
“If there is a next life, I will save you.”

Aria is the last remaining siren, a monster who bewitches humans with song. Shackled, she is forced to sing to nobles until she coughs blood. By the time the demonized Grand Duke Lloyd Valentine frees her, it’s too late. She has already breathed her last… or so she thinks. When she awakens in the past, Aria dedicates her life to protecting the duke, but she wonders if that’s really all her life is worth. Will she ever be free? Or is this siren destined to sing the same song forever?

---

description.fr:
Aria est la dernière des Sirènes, dont le chant ensorcelle les humains. Enfermée dans la cage de l'Empereur, elle doit chanter jusqu'à la mort. Lorsque le duc de Valentine, noble maudit et habité par un démon, lui propose de tuer toute la cour pour la libérer, Aria, déjà condamnée, accepte. Mais avant de rendre son dernier souffle, elle revient dans le passé, à l'année de ses dix ans. Saisissant cette nouvelle chance, elle va tout faire pour sauver le duc de la malédiction qui pèse sur lui...

description.id:
Setelah ibunya yang seorang siren meninggal, Aria menjadi burung yang terkurung dan harus bernyanyi untuk kaisar sampai mati. Di saat dia hampir mati, Lloyd, grand duke iblis datang dan membawa Aria keluar dari kandang burung. Saat itu Aria berpikir... "Kalau ada kehidupan selanjutnya, aku akan menolongmu." Ketika ia membuka mata, Aria kembali pada waktu di mana dia berusia 10 tahun. Saat itu dia berencana untuk melakukan pernikahan kontrak dengan Lloyd demi melindungi dirinya dan Lloyd.

description.it:
"Nella prossima vita, ti salverò". Aria è l'ultima sirena rimasta e, con il suo canto, incanta gli esseri umani. Rinchiusa ed incatenata, è costretta a cantare per i nobili fino al punto di tossire sangue. Quando il "demone" Granduca Lloyd la salva è ormai troppo tardi ed Aria esala l'ultimo respiro tra le sue braccia. Quando si risveglia, Aria si ritrova nel suo corpo di bambina di 10 anni. Decide così di prendere in mano la sua vita e di dedicarla alla protezione del Granduca, in segno di gratitudine per averla salvata. Ma Aria sarà mai davvero libera?

description.ko:
아리아는 계약 결혼을 제안했다.
그것도, 악마에게 영혼을 팔았다는 발렌타인의 대공자에게.
자신을 지키고, 그를 지키기 위해서.

[나와 결혼해.]

아리아는 단풍잎 같은 손으로, 쪽지와 함께 혼인 서약서를 내밀었다.

[계약 결혼이니까 10년 뒤에 이혼…….]

그러자 어린 대공자는 쓰고 있던 쪽지를 빼앗아 쫙쫙 찢으며 말했다.

“그래서, 도장은 어디에 찍으면 되지?”

“크면 이혼해주겠다고 했잖아.”

어느새 훌쩍 자란 악마 대공이, 그녀의 머리카락 위에 경건하게 입을 맞추며 말했다.

“어른이 되었으니 어른의 계약을 해야지.”

description.pt-br:
Sereias... um nome derivado de uma criatura antiga, usado para descrever aqueles que podem encantar, atrair, controlar e curar os outros cantando. Anos atrás, uma sereia chamada Sophia foi sequestrada pelo conde Cortez como sua preciosa sereia, e uma garota chamada Aria nasceu logo depois como sua filha. Sujeita a viver a vida de uma sereia, Aria experimentou, viu e ouviu muitas coisas horríveis. Outros fariam qualquer coisa para ouvi-la cantar, ao ponto da insanidade. O imperador, que ficou obcecado por ela, quebrou suas pernas e a trancou em uma gaiola dentro do palácio imperial para escondê-la e mantê-la para si mesmo. Despedaçada terrivelmente, Aria se resignou à morte, quando de repente - O Arquiduque Diabólico, Lloyd Cardenis Valentine, chegou e sussurrou: "Devo matar todos aqui? Se precisar de mim, é só me chamar. Sua música sempre me alcançará, onde quer que você esteja." No final, Aria chamou o diabo, levando a morte a todos os presentes, exceto ela mesma. "Vamos cair no inferno juntos." E com isso, Aria deu seu último suspiro e morreu... apenas para voltar a ser como era há 10 anos. Agora que ela tem uma segunda chance em sua vida, Aria está determinada a mudar seu destino, assim como o futuro cruel de seu salvador, o arquiduque Valentine. Ela lhe propõe um contrato de casamento, com o divórcio planejado 10 anos depois, mas ele tem outros planos...

---

altTitles.ja: TS衛生兵さんの戦場日記

altTitles.pt-br: Diário de Guerra da Enfermeira Transgênero

description.en:
An ex-pro gamer of the FPS genre (♂) reincarnated in a fantasy world filled with magic... Only to learn that what greeted him was not a scene from one's dreams, but a muddy battlefield full of bullets flying to and fro! Moreover, he's now an orphan girl named Touri Noel?!

After her aptitude for healing magic was discovered, she decided to volunteer in the army as a second-class medic, all to raise money for the orphanage where she was born and raised. However, without even getting magic training, she was attached to an assault squad, repeatedly fighting on the most cruel battlefields of the "Western Front."
The mission given to her was to become the personal medic of the frontline's ace, Garback, and not let him die at any cost. But he turned out to be the worst commander, who will try to get results whatever the cost, even if it means the death of his subordinates!

On the battlefield, mired in unreasonable orders and violence, Touri's fierce battle for survival continues...
description.ja:
FPSの元プロゲーマー♂が転生した世界は魔法が存在するファンタジー世界だった――が、そこには夢広がる冒険はなく、銃弾が飛び交う泥沼の戦場が待っていた！　しかも、トウリ・ノエルという名の孤児の「少女」として……!?

トウリは回復魔法への適性を見出され、生まれ育った孤児院への資金援助のため軍に志願し二等衛生兵となる。しかし魔法の訓練も受けないまま、彼女は最も過酷な戦闘が繰り広げられている「西部戦線」の突撃部隊へと配属されてしまう。
彼女に与えられた任務は戦線のエースであるガーバックの専属衛生兵となり、絶対に彼を死なせないこと。けれどガーバックは部下を見殺しにしてでも戦果を上げる最低の指揮官でもあった！

理不尽な命令と暴力が飛び交う戦場で、トウリはただ生き残るために奮闘するが――。

altTitles.en: I Thought It's a Common Isekai Story
I Thought It Was a Common Possession

altTitles.fr: Not So Bad to Be Bad!

description.en: I was the villainess who would die at the hands of the male lead, but I know this is a cliché! I thought it was a pretty good deal to die unjustly, as a payment for the price I paid for being the villainess. Until I realized that I couldn’t escape from the original plotline. If I was going to die anyway according to the original, then let’s give a kiss to my handsome husband!… Why did the original plot start to change?
description.ko:
그럼 그렇지, 내 팔자에 무슨 주인공이야.

남편 손에 죽을 팔자의 악녀였지만, 난 이 클리셰를 안다!​
억울하게 죽은 대가로는 꽤 괜찮다고 생각했다.
원작의 흐름에서 벗어나지 못한다는 걸 깨닫기 전까지는.
결국 원작대로 죽을 거라면, 초미남 남편에게 뽀뽀라도 해보자!

description.en:
High school student Li Huowang possesses an ability: whenever he closes his eyes, he enters a bizarre cultivation world. In that strange world, he is captured by someone who calls him “Master” and is made into a living medicine—a human cauldron that could be turned into a pill at any moment.

In the real world, however, Li Huowang is a mentally ill patient living in a psychiatric hospital, unable to attend school. The doctors tell him that the bizarre cultivation world is nothing but a hallucination.

Now, caught between reality and illusion, truth and lies, Li Huowang breaks down, crying and shouting:
“Mom, I really can’t tell what’s real anymore!”
description.vi: Học sinh trung học Lý Hỏa Vượng sở hữu khả năng chỉ cần nhắm mắt là có thể đi đến một thế giới tu tiên kỳ quái. Trong thế giới kỳ quái đó, cậu bị một người được gọi là "Sư phụ" bắt đi làm một dược nhân, có thể bị luyện thành đan dược bất cứ lúc nào. Còn trong thế giới thực, Lý Hỏa Vượng là một bệnh nhân tâm thần sống trong bệnh viện tâm thần, không thể đi học được nữa. Bác sĩ nói với cậu rằng, thế giới tu tiên kỳ quái đó chỉ là ảo giác của cậu mà thôi. Giờ đây, thật thật giả giả, giả giả thật thật, Lý Hỏa Vượng bật khóc trong tuyệt vọng và hét lên: “Mẹ ơi, con thật sự không phân biệt nổi nữa!
description.pt-br: Li Huowang, um estudante do ensino médio, possui uma habilidade peculiar: sempre que fecha os olhos, ele entra em um mundo de cultivo bizarro. Nesse mundo estranho, ele é capturado por alguém que o chama de “Mestre” e acaba transformado em uma medicina viva — um humano…

description.en: Having suffered several setbacks in her attempt to be a voice actor, Chi Yu no longer dares to bring up her hobby of dubbing in front of others. Instead, she covertly tunes in to voice drama broadcasts on Lily Radio. One day, during a public lecture at her university, she discovers that Yu Chen from the neighboring college shares a strikingly similar voice to the host of Lily Radio.

title.en: Hakanai Kimi wa Moukou wo Hajimeru

altTitles.ja: 儚いキミは猛攻をはじめる

altTitles.en: The Fairytale-like You Goes on the Assault

altTitles.zh: 童话般的你开始了恋爱猛攻

altTitles.uk: Як у казці починається історія кохання

description.en: Kagari, an ephemeral beauty, reunites with her older childhood friend, Nana-kun, and begins her romantic assault on him.
description.vi: Một series siêu ngọt nữa tới từ Hazano Kazutake - tác giả của bộ Thánh nữ Cecilia và mục sư Lawrence. Câu chuyện về đôi bạn thưở nhỏ cứ tối đến là lại ở chung nhà để đảm bảo sự an toàn cho nhau...

title.en: Akuyaku Reijou wa Dekiai Route ni Hairimashita!?

altTitles.ja: 悪役令嬢は溺愛ルートに入りました！？

altTitles.en: The Villainess’s Guide to (Not) Falling in Love

altTitles.zh-hk: 反派千金進入了溺愛路線！？

altTitles.zh: 反派千金进入了溺爱路线！？

description.en:
In my past life, I was an unpopular woman nearing her thirties. However, when I died, I got reincarnated in a dating sim as the villainess, Luciana.
At this rate, I'll face a hopeless future of exile in a punishment event...
And that's bad! I'm going to do my best to avoid all the romantic interests in the game and live a peaceful new life so that I can escape that event!
But... Why are they all approaching me?!
I want to stay low-key, but the people around me just won't leave me alone!
description.zh-hk:
【轉生成反派千金要是不迴避定罪的話......突然進入溺愛路線!?】
明明前世是個30多歲的平民喪女，卻轉生進乙女遊戲中便成了反派千金・露西安娜。
如果就這樣下去等待著的，只有在定罪事件上被流放的絕望未來了.....那可真是不妙！
為了迴避定罪事件，要避開所有戀愛攻略角色，這一世也要平安的度過！
但是，為什麼都靠過來了呢？
明明想要低調度日的說，但身邊的人不肯放過我！
明明戀愛經驗為0卻突然進入了溺愛路線!?
就這樣被寵愛著的發展，要跟不上了―――！

title.en: Xie'e Lianjin Shushi Gao Buding Ziji De Shiyan Ti

altTitles.zh: 邪恶炼金术士搞不定自己的实验体

altTitles.zh-ro: Xié'è Liànjīn Shùshì Gǎo Bùdìng Zìjǐ De Shíyàn Tǐ

altTitles.zh-hk: 邪惡煉金術士搞不定自己的實驗體

altTitles.en: The Evil Alchemist Can't Handle His Own Experiment
The Evil Alchemist Can't Handle His Own Test Subject

altTitles.zh-ro: Si Ling Fashi! Wo Ji Shi Tianzai
Sǐ Líng Fǎshī! Wǒ Jí Shì Tiānzāi

description.en:
In a world where magic and monsters exist, Lin Moyu has hit the age of acquiring his very own profession. While most would be lucky just to obtain a high-level combat class, Moyu becomes the ultrarare necromancer!

Being the first and only one of his kind, he has no idea of the potential he possesses on his journey to level up and face great challenges.

What new heights will Moyu achieve with his unique army of undead?
description.vi: Thế giới game hòa làm một với hiện thực, mọi quy tắc bị phá vỡ,nhân loại tiến vào thời đại toàn dân chuyển chức. Chỉ có trở thành chuyển chức giả! Thăng cấp biến mạnh! Mới có thể bước lên đỉnh cao của đời người! Vào ngày chuyển chức,Lâm Mặc thức tỉnh chức nghiệp ẩn độc nhất Tử Linh Pháp Sư. Từ đây Chỉ cần vật triệu hoàn không chết thì Thì đồng nghĩa Lâm Mặc cũng sẽ không bao giờ chết. "Ta ngồi trên hài cốt thần tọa, đi lại giữa sự sống và cái chết"
description.zh: 游戏降临现实，世界规则颠覆，人类进入全民转职时代。 唯有成为转职者！升级变强！方能站上世界之巅！ 转职当天，林默语成为唯一性隐藏职业，死灵法师。 从此召唤物不死绝，林默语便不会死。 “我高坐骸骨神座，行走生死之间。” “我即是天灾！”

title.en: Tensei Shitara Joban de Shinu Nakabosudatta ―Hiroin Kenzoku-ka de Ikinokoru―

altTitles.ja: 転生したら序盤で死ぬ中ボスだった ―ヒロイン眷属化で生き残る―

altTitles.en: When I Reincarnated, I was a Mid-boss Who Died Early in the Game ―Survive by Becoming a Household Member with Heroine―

altTitles.vi: Chuyển sinh làm boss trung cấp

altTitles.zh-hk: 轉生後是初期死亡中頭目 —靠著將女主角眷屬化而倖存—

description.en: When I woke up after an accident, I was reincarnated as a mid-boss destined to die in the early stages of the game! In order to avoid being killed by the hero who should come attacking soon, I will fight and make the women my subordinates to increase my allies!
description.ja:
事故に遭って目が覚めたら、ゲームの序盤で死ぬ中ボスに転生！やがて襲ってくるはずの勇者に殺されないために、××して女たちを眷属にして仲間を増やせ！
___
- ![Syosetsu](<https://i.imgur.com/HI4jAzg.png>) [Web Novel (R18)](https://novel18.syosetu.com/n3298hj)

altTitles.ja: もどきども
きみは四葉のクローバー

altTitles.en: You are a Four Leaf Clover

description.en: Uichi was once popular, but now he is being bullied excessively. Then suddenly, his first love, Yotsuha, appears in front of him. What is this cute and brave girl's purpose...?
description.ja: かつての人気者で、今は過激ないじめを受ける宇一。そんな彼の前に突然現れた初恋の相手・よつは。可愛く健気な彼女の目的とは一体…!?
description.vi: Câu chuyện romcom nhẹ nhàng về hành trình chữa lành trái tim đã tan vỡ của main
description.zh: 某天，曾很有人气的宇一的生活陡然一变。 以往光芒四射的日子被用抹布也无法擦去的黑暗所笼罩。 这时，熟悉宇一过去的初恋—— 四叶突然出现在了他的面前。 她的目的究竟是…！？

description.en:
Daily Chaldea is an unofficial daily slice-of-life fancomic created using art assets from the game Fate/Grand Order and building upon the existing lore of the franchise.

The story follows the adventures of genderswapping protagonist Ritsuka Fujimaru and the many Servants they've summoned, with the tone ranging from comedic to philosophical. The comic is 'live' with the NA server of Fate/Grand Order, with new characters appearing in the comic around the time they appear in the game and comics often referencing recent events in the game.

Enjoyment of this comic relies heavily upon the reader's familiarity with the game and its characters, so the author recommends playing Fate/Grand Order before reading this comic.

---

This comic is being uploaded to MangaDex by reader request and with the approval of MangaDex staff. All art is copyright TYPE-Moon / FGO Project, Aniplex Inc., Lasengle, and other copyright holders as appropriate. This comic is not for profit (through ad revenue or otherwise).

Some early use the original white backgrounds. Later comics have darker backgrounds and additional art assets for improved quality.

title.en: Nichiasa Suki no Otaku ga Akuyaku Seito ni Tenseishita Kekka, Hametsu Flag ga Houkaishiteiku Ken ni Tsuite

altTitles.ja: ニチアサ好きのオタクが悪役生徒に転生した結果、破滅フラグが崩壊していく件について

altTitles.en: Regarding the Destruction of the Destruction Flag as a Result of a Nichiasa-Loving Otaku Being Reincarnated as a Villainous Student.

description.en:
Yugo Kurei is a high school student that loves tokusatsu hero shows. One day, he loses his life protecting a child from a street slasher, but he is reincarnated in another world as Yugo Clay, a character from a certain game. However, Yugo is the most disliked person in the school and is destined to die tragically... He was reincarnated as a villain, but with the new power of magic in his hands, he aims to become a hero!

"In this world, I can become the strongest hero!" A hero story of a tokusatsu otaku who rises from the bottom while crushing his doom flags!
description.ja:
日曜日の朝に放送されているヒーロー番組をこよなく愛している高校生・呉井雄悟。ある日、通り魔から子供を庇って命を落とすが、気づくと【ルミナス・ヒストリー】というゲームのキャラクター、ユーゴ・クレイとして異世界転生していた。しかし、ユーゴというキャラは学園一の嫌われ者で、ゆくゆくは無様に命を落とす運命・・・

そんな悪役キャラに転生したが、魔法という新たな力を手にしたことで、ヒーローになれる可能性に気づく！

「この世界なら俺は“本物”のヒーローになれる！」

title.en: Chika Idol wo Kage de Sasaeru Ore

altTitles.ja: 地下アイドルを影で支える俺

altTitles.en: Supporting an Underground Idol from the Shadows

description.en: Kageyama, an unremarkable boy, secretly receives a message from gal classmate Natsukawa, saying, "Meet me at the usual karaoke place after school." He goes to karaoke with her alone. There, Kageyama reveals something he had been asked by Natsukawa to show her.
description.ja: 学校イチのギャルであり、密かに地下アイドル活動を行う、夏川りお。全く冴えない同級生男子、影山とは教室では素知らぬふりを通している。しかし、実は、影山が彼女の地下アイドル活動に楽曲を提供していて…。
description.pl: Kageyama, niewyróżniający się chłopak, otrzymuje potajemnie wiadomość od koleżanki z klasy, Natsukawy, o treści "Spotkajmy się po szkole w miejscu z Karaoke". Idzie tam z nią sam na sam. Tam, Kageyama pokazuje coś o co został poproszony przez Natsukawe.
description.pt-br:
Kageyama, um garoto normal, recebe secretamente uma mensagem da colega de classe Natsukawa, dizendo: “Encontre-me no karaokê de sempre depois da escola”.

Ele vai ao karaokê sozinho com ela. Lá, Kageyama revela algo que Natsukawa pediu para mostrar a ela.

altTitles.ja: クソ女に幸あれ

description.en:
"I've been cheating on you. Oh, and it's not just one guy. It's three. Sorry about that."

Back in middle school, Akiyoshi Sunao's first-ever girlfriend shattered his heart, and he swore off love. However, all that changes when he develops a crush on a girl in his university's film club. Just as he's finally beginning to move on from the past, he bumps into his ex-girlfriend. Little does he know that this is only the beginning...

To his horror, he wakes up in her body the next morning!
description.ja: 「実は4股してるの　ごめんね」。中学時代、人生で初めての彼女にヒドイ振られ方をした秋吉直（あきよしすなお）。「もう誰かを好きになることなんてない」と思っていたが、大学生となり映画サークルの先輩・小河原菜摘（こがはらなつみ）に惹かれ始める。しかし、そんな折に元カノ・西川檸檬（にしかわれもん）と再会。しかも翌朝目が覚めると、身体が入れ替わっていて…!?
description.vi:
"T-tớ đã cắm sừng cậu, không chỉ một anh đâu...là ba anh lận cơ!"
Những câu nói như gai sắt cứa vào tim cậu từ cuối cấp hai năm ấy vẫn còn làm cậu ám ảnh. Akiyoshi Sunao, hiện tại cậu đã trở thành sinh viên năm nhất và làm thành viên của câu lạc bộ phim ảnh, cậu còn nỗi ám ảnh kia là từ mối tình đầu hồi cuối cấp hai của cậu, Lemon Nishikawa. Cậu đã mất niềm tin vào tình yêu suốt cả cao trung, đến khi lên đại học thì anh đã phải lòng crush mới hơn mình một tuổi tên Kogahara Natsumi. Ngay khi cậu nghĩ mình đã suýt thì "move on" và tìm được tình yêu mới để tận hưởng thanh xuân, "Cô bạn" bắt cá bốn tay năm nào lại vô tình xuất hiện. Khoảnh khắc ấy, những câu nói chí mạng như hiện về cứa cậu thêm phát nữa...Cậu đã cố gắng lảng tránh cô người yêu cũ ấy và cổ vũ bản thân vượt lên sự kiện mọc sừng ấy. Cậu suýt thì thành công...
"S-sao mình lại biến thành ghệ cũ của mình?!"
Cậu đã bị hoán đổi linh hồn với chính cô nàng người yêu cũ ấy, và đối phương cũng nhận ra điều đó. Họ phải làm gì để vượt qua nghịch cảnh? Liệu họ có nhìn nhận lại những góc khuất của nhau? Và liệu họ có trở lại với nhau? Mời các bạn đọc truyện nhé!~

Fun fact: Tiêu đề tiếng Nhật của truyện này có thể được dịch thẳng là "Hạnh Phúc Nhé, Con Đĩ!"
description.es-la: "Te he estado engañando. Ah, y no es sólo un chico. Son tres. Lo siento". En la secundaria, la primera novia de Akiyoshi Sunao le destrozó el corazón y renunció al amor. Sin embargo, todo eso cambia cuando se enamora de una chica en el club de cine de su universidad. Justo cuando finalmente comienza a dejar atrás el pasado, se topa con su exnovia. Lo que no sabe es que esto es sólo el comienzo... ¡Para su horror, se despierta en su cuerpo a la mañana siguiente!
description.pt-br: "Eu tenho te traído. Ah, e não é apenas um cara. São três. Desculpe por isso." De volta ao ensino médio, o primeiro amor de Akiyoshi Sunao despedaçou seu coração, e ele jurou evitar o amor. No entanto, tudo muda quando ele se apaixona por uma garota no clube de cinema da universidade. Justo quando ele está começando a superar o passado, ele esbarra com sua ex-namorada. Mal sabe ele que isso é apenas o começo... Para seu horror, ele acorda no corpo dela na manhã seguinte!

title.en: The Jet Black Hedgehog: Shadow the Hedgehog

altTitles.ja: 漆黒のハリネズミ シャドウ・ザ・ヘッジホッグ

altTitles.ja-ro: Shikkoku no Harinezumi Shadow the Hedgehog

description.en:
The meaning of his birth. The answer he leads to is—

A new serialization of a full-speed action franchise that has attracted the world's attention!

An adaptation of the much-talked-about *Sonic x Shadow Generations*! CoroCoro's No.1 antihero has arrived.

title.en: Isekai Shoukan Oji-san no Juumusou Life ~Sabage Suki Salaryman wa Kaisha Owari ni Isekai e Chokki suru~

altTitles.ja: 異世界召喚おじさんの銃無双ライフ 〜サバゲー好きサラリーマンは会社終わりに異世界へ直帰する〜

altTitles.ru: Призванный в потусторонний мир дядя - живёт оружейным воином

altTitles.vi: Cuộc sống "thiện xạ" của ông chú được triệu hồi sang dị giới

description.en: The middle-aged man and airsoft enthusiast Daisuke Koga is summoned to a different world on his 40th birthday. Given the ability to turn airsoft guns into real guns, Daisuke must save the other world while traveling back and forth between reality and the fantasy world. Alongside female swordsman Rena, Daisuke becomes the only gun user and dominates in the fantasy world after work!
description.id: Seorang om-om yang hobi bermain airsoft bernama koga daisuke telah terpanggil ke dunai lain pada ulang tahunnya yang ke-40. Dianugerahi sebuah kekuatan untuk mengubah senjata airsoft menjadi senjata asli, daisuke harus bisa menyelamatkan dunia tersebut selagi bolak-balik dari dunia lain ke dunia nyata. bersama dengan seorang ksatria bernama lena, daisuke menjadi satu-satunya pengguna senapan yang akan mendominasi dunia lain tersebut sepulang kerja!
description.ja: サバゲー好きのサラリーマン・古賀大介は、40歳の誕生日を迎えた日に異世界に召喚された。現実と異世界を行き来しながら、異世界を救うことになった大介に与えられたのは、「エアガンを本物の銃に変化させる能力」。異世界で出会った女性剣士・レナと共に、大介は唯一の銃使いとして会社終わりに異世界で無双する!!

title.en: Ookami wa Tsuki ni Koi wo Suru

altTitles.ja: オオカミは月に恋をする

altTitles.en: Wolf Falls in Love with Moon

altTitles.vi: Nàng Sói Trót Phải Lòng Với Mặt Trăng

description.en:
I'm the only one who knows my senpai's face. Senpai, who was supposed to hate me, ended up saying "I like you" to me...

The perfect but slightly scary Student Council President, "Wolf-senpai" aka Ookamigawa Rina, and the frivolous and clumsy Vice-President, Tsukiyama Yuuga. These two are complete opposites of each other, save for the fact that both of them have a secret face. One day, at his secret part-time job, he discovers Wolf-senpai's secret face...?
description.ja:
俺だけが知ってる、先輩の顔。俺のことが嫌いなはずの先輩に「好き」と言われてしまった───。

完璧だけどちょっぴり怖い生徒会長、『オオカミ先輩』こと狼川琉奈。そして、チャラくてポンコツな副会長・月山雄牙。二人はなにもかも正反対。ーーーひとつ、お互いに秘密の顔があることを除いて。ある時、月山は秘密にしているアルバイトを通じて、オオカミ先輩の裏の顔を知ることになり…!?

altTitles.ja: ソードガイ 装刀凱

description.en:
A woman dies a suspicious death in the forest. Her tragic child, Gai, is adopted by Amon, a master swordsmith. More than ten years later, Gai becomes Amon's apprentice, but loses his right arm in an accident while making a sword. Amon crushes the magical sword "Death Dragon" and rebuilds it as an artificial arm for Gai, but...?
A young boy accepts a cruel fate in a whirlwind of battles. Is it darkness that lies ahead for him, or...?

altTitles.ja: しかのこのこのここしたんたん

description.en:
No one knows Torako used to be a delinquent. All of her classmates only know her as the perfect student. But everything changes when Nokotan, a transfer student with antlers, enters her life. Antlers aren’t the only thing strange about Nokotan. Her deer nose can sniff out Torako’s secret past! Whether it’s at school or the zoo, chaos follows this doe-eyed girl’s every step. Torako has so many questions! Is Nokotan a deer, a girl, or something in-between?

Trivia:
- The author is the illustrator/'mama' for Hololive Vtuber [Amane Kanata (天音かなた)](https://www.youtube.com/@AmaneKanata). Because of this, physical copies on Amazon sold out within a day.
description.ja: 出会いはある朝、彼女のツノが電線に引っかかっていたから………!?うっかり変なツノの生えた女の子を助けたことで優等生（の皮を被った）虎視虎子の人生が大混乱に!?一人の少女（元ヤン）が一人のシカ（？）に出会うガール・ミーツ・シカ物語（コメディ）開幕!!

altTitles.vi: Nhân vật Webtoon  Na Kang Lim

altTitles.pt-br: Personagem de Webtoon: Na Kang Lim

description.en: Na Kang Lim, a high school student who enjoys reading webtoons, experiences a strange event one day when the female lead from his favorite webtoon appears before him. Even more surprising, the same incidents that put her in danger in the webtoon start happening in real life. The problem is, there's no protagonist in the real world to save her! Ultimately, Na Kang Lim takes on the role of the protagonist, looping through time to save her.
description.vi: Na Kang Lim, nam sinh trung học bình trường rất thích đọc webtoon. Một ngày, đã có chuyện bất ngờ xảy ra, nữ chính từ bộ webtoon cậu hay đọc đã xuất hiện ngoài đợi thật. Những sự cố trong webtoon khiến cô ấy rơi vào khủng hoảng, nhưng nhân vật chính lại không có ở đây để giải cứu nữ chính! Và Kang Lim đã trở thành nhân vật chính cùng với kí ước từ bộ truyện và khả năng du hành thời gian để cứu nữ chính
description.pt-br: Na Kang Lim, um estudante do ensino médio que gosta de ler webtoons, vivencia um evento estranho um dia, quando a protagonista de seu webtoon favorito aparece diante dele. Mais surpreendente ainda, os mesmos incidentes que a colocam em perigo no webtoon começam a acontecer na vida real. O problema é que, no mundo real, não há um protagonista para salvá-la! No fim, Na Kang Lim assume o papel do protagonista, voltando no tempo para salvá-la.

altTitles.zh: 最后再拜托您一件事可以吗

altTitles.zh-hk: 最後再拜托您一件事可以嗎

description.en:
The engagement between Scarlet, a noblewoman from a ducal family, and Second Prince Kyle was suddenly annulled during a ball. 
She had been falsely accused of harassing a girl called Terenezza, daughter to a baron, whom the Prince doted on heavily. 
Condemned by everyone around her and forced to burden all manner of crimes, she finally decided enough was enough.  
  
“Before I leave here, may I please ask you just one last thing?”  
  
As the crowd threw their boos and jeers, and that good looking guy flung his insults── 
her palm spun like a drill and the ballroom floor was stained with blood. From her fists, their reckoning!
description.ja: 舞踏会の最中に、第二王子カイルからいきなり婚約破棄を告げられたスカーレット。さらには、あらぬ罪を着せられて〝悪役令嬢〟呼ばわりされ、大勢の貴族達から糾弾される羽目に。今までずっと我慢してきたけれど、おバカなカイルに付き合うのは、もう限界！　アタマに来たスカーレットは、あるお願いを口にする。――『最後に、貴方達をブッ飛ばしてもよろしいですか？』

altTitles.ja: 押忍！！空手部

description.en:
The series began as a fairly humorous and lighthearted satire of Japan's teenage delinquent-gang subculture told from the perspective of Matsushita Tadashi (who also narrates these early Karate Bu stories), a 2nd year student at Kangokou High and a constant target of Kangokou's numerous bullies who beat him up routinely after school. He is almost always accompanied by his best friend Saitou Takaki, who is also constantly harassed.  
  
As the pair grow increasingly tired of being victimized they decide to join the titular Karate Club, which is notorious throughout Osaka's youth gangs for training and producing the city's most hardened and toughest teenage thugs while maintaining the facade of a legit school sports club. But when they join the club, they find themselves picked on just as much if not worse by the club's current members. But as the story progresses they grow to be increasingly capable fighters.  
  
Along with the manga's change in attitude and central character, the various teenage fighters throughout the series grew increasingly stronger and even began to tap into superhuman ki abilities, putting Osu!! Karate Bu in the company of other similar epic Shōnen fighting manga such as Yu Yu Hakusho, Dragon Ball, and Fist of the North Star.  
  
Osu!! Karate Bu was wildly popular in its native Japan, but is otherwise almost completely unknown in most other countries. It spawned a four episode OVA mini-series released over a period of two years from 1990-1992, a 1990 live action movie, and a 1994 Super Famicom fighting game.

description.ja: 幼少の頃から「幻妖」と呼ばれる存在が見えた少年・夜島学郎。高校入学初日、ひょんなことから出会ったサブカル好きの幻妖「鵺」に校内の幻妖退治を依頼されるが――…？
